name: The World Ends With You: Fan Remake
name_original: The World Ends With You: Fan Remake
description:
So, I recently beat The World Ends With You on the Nintendo Switch and loved it so much that I decided to try and remake it on PC...

And maybe add more content

This is just a little project and it's also the first time I've ever coded a game so it's really buggy and just meh but I'm having fun with it

The controls are:
WASD or arrow keys to move
Space to dash
Left click to shoot

I own nothing here
TWEWY is owned by Square Enix

If you have any feedback or ideas you can DM me on twitter: @Diginerate
